faq.question: Are CyberMech robots safe for human interaction?
faq.answer: Yes. All our AI systems are programmed with Asimov's Laws of Robotics for human safety compliance.

faq.question: Do you offer AI customization?
faq.answer: Yes. Our AI personalities and functionalities can be fully customized based on user requirements.

faq.question: Can CyberMech robots be weaponized?
faq.answer: Military-grade units are available for authorized government agencies and private defense contractors.

faq.question: What is the power source for your robots?
faq.answer: Our robots run on next-gen fusion batteries, ensuring long operational cycles without frequent recharging.

faq.question: Do CyberMech robots require maintenance?
faq.answer: Yes, regular software updates and hardware inspections are recommended every 6 months.

faq.question: Can I purchase a humanoid android for personal use?
faq.answer: Yes, but personal-use models have limited AI autonomy for safety reasons.

faq.question: Do you provide international shipping?
faq.answer: Yes, our products can be shipped worldwide with the necessary regulatory approvals.

faq.question: How do CyberMech robots handle cybersecurity threats?
faq.answer: All our robots have military-grade encryption and self-defense mechanisms against hacking attempts.
